title: Marcin Klemensowski
text: Marcin Klemensowski of <a href="Gozdawa%20coat%20of%20arms">Gozdawa</a> (1791-1869) was a Polish military officer and a <a href="pu%C5%82kownik">Colonel</a> of the <a href="Polish%20Army">Polish Army</a>. During the <a href="November%20Uprising">November Uprising</a> he served as the quartermaster general of the <a href="Polish%20Army">Polish Army</a>. After the fall of the uprising he withdrew from the military and settled in the manor of <a href="Celej%C3%B3w%2C%20Lublin%20Voivodeship">Celejów</a> near <a href="Pu%C5%82awy">Puławy</a>. He died 15 February 1869 and is buried at Warsaw's <a href="Pow%C4%85zki%20Cemetery">Powązki Cemetery</a>.[
